author: Rick Spilman
content: The savings from one mast are significant even if they are in single digits percentages. Most sail assist designs that offer these levels of savings, project a three-year payback period. Of course, this will also depend on fuel prices, route, and a number of other factors. As Jean-Pierre suggests this looks like a trial installation of a wholly new design. Measuring performance and tweaking operating issues will be easier with a single sail.
